story.storykicker: The Andhra Bank has released an employment notification, inviting interested, eligible candidates to apply for the position of Security Officers in MMGS-III. The last date for online registration is June 13.
story.storybody:
The Andhra Bank has released an employment notification, inviting interested, eligible candidates to apply for the position of Security Officers in MMGS-III. Interested, eligible employees of Andhra Bank may also apply through a proper channel.

Vacancy details

Total posts: 11

Name of the posts:

Security Officers

Eligibility criteria

Educational qualification:

The candidates interested in applying for this post should have done graduation in any discipline from a recognised university and should have served as an officer with a minimum of five years of experience as a commissioned officer in armed forces or should have been a police officer not below the rank of an assistant superintendent of police/deputy superintendent of police with minimum five years in the grade

Or

An officer of equivalent ranks in para military forces (BSF,ITBP,SSB,CRPF,COAST GUARD) with a minimum of five years of experience.

Age limit:

The age of the candidates applying for this post must not exceed 40 years and must be of minimum 21 years. Relaxation in age will be provided as per the government norms.

Selection procedure:

An interview will be conducted for selecting the candidates.

Pay scale:

The selected candidates will be getting Rs 11.48 lacs (per year).

How to apply

The candidates interested in these posts are required to apply online at www.andhrabank.in. After submitting the application form, copy of the application should be sent along with counterfoil of UTR no./transfer/cash voucher in an enclosed envelope super scribed "APPLICATION FOR THE POST OF SECURITY OFFICER (MMGS III) in Andhra Bank", to 'Andhra Bank Recruitment Section, H R Department, Dr. Pattabhi Bhavan, Saifabad, Hyderabad, Telangana -500 004'.

Important dates

The online registration will start from June 3.

The last date for online registration is June 13.

For information on more latest government jobs, click here.
